sign_up.title: Sign up
sign_up.content: Please input account you want to create.
sign_up.email_empty: E-mail is empty. Please input e-mail.
sign_up.email_exist: The account already exists for that email.
sign_up.email_verification_check: E-mail verification is not confirmed. Will you send a verification e-mail to {}?
sign_up.password_incorrect: Password is not correct. Please input password over 7.
sign_up.password_is_not_same: Password is not same. Please check password.
sign_up.password_reset_question: Do you want to send an e-mail to reset password?
